resources.string: The Port Said Lighthouse is one of the most important architectural and tourist landmarks in the city of Port Said in Egypt.
The Port Said National Museum consists of a one floor building and it hosts some of the spoils the Egyptian forces were able to gather from the Israelis in the War of the 6th of October.
Wonderful place to have coffee, meals, quick meal and cozy place with friendly service staff
Family-friendly chain known for its made-to-order pizzas.
